content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Smelting Area (Position x=0-4, y=0-4)
Consists of three stone furnaces:
- Stone furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at position (4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces currently have no ingredients but contain copper plate output

### Copper Cable Production Line (Position x=7.5-12.5, y=9.5-11.5)
Consists of:
- Small electric pole at position (7.5, 9.5)
- Burner inserter at position (7.5, 10.5) moving items from pole to chest
- Input wooden chest at position (7.5, 11.5) containing copper plates and cables
- Assembling machine 1 at position (9.5, 11.5) for making copper cables
- Output burner inserter at position (11.5, 11.5)
- Output wooden chest at position (12.5, 11.5) containing iron plates, copper cables and electronic circuits

### Storage Area (Position x=14.5-16.5, y=11.5)
Consists of two wooden chests:
- Chest at (14.5, 11.5) containing iron plates and copper plates (full)
- Chest at (16.5, 11.5) containing iron plates

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to -1.0, y=22.5-24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at (-3.5, 24.5)
- Small electric pole at (-2.5, 22.5)
Connected by pipe system carrying water/steam

### Science Pack Handling (Position x=0.5, y=28.5-31.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position (0.5, 28.5)
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5)
- Wooden chest at (0.5, 31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with inserter placement
- Check for existing entities before placing inserters
- Ensure target position is clear before attempting to place inserter
- Verify inserter placement coordinates are valid and not occupied

### Fuel management errors
- Ensure sufficient coal is in inventory before attempting to fuel inserters
- Maintain coal supply for burner inserters and boilers
- Harvest more coal when running low to prevent operation interruptions

### Entity positioning errors
- Validate target positions before placing entities
- Remove conflicting entities before placing new ones
- Consider space requirements for different entity types

### Power system issues
- Keep boiler fueled to maintain consistent power supply
- Monitor steam engine status to ensure proper power generation
- Ensure electrical network connections are maintained
